title: Rommel - The Desert Fox (Full Documentary)
description: Comprehensive documentary covering Erwin Rommel's career from WWI through his command of the Afrika Korps, examining the making of the Desert Fox legend.

title: WW2 - North African Campaign [1940-1943]
description: Animated overview of the entire North African Campaign from the Italian invasion of Egypt through the final Allied victory in Tunisia.

title: The Battle of El Alamein - Animated
description: Detailed animated battle analysis of the Second Battle of El Alamein, showing Montgomery's plan to break through Rommel's defenses.

title: Siege of Tobruk - The Rats of Tobruk
description: The story of the 241-day siege where Australian and Allied defenders held Tobruk against Rommel's Afrika Korps.

title: SAS: The Original Desert Raiders (Documentary)
description: Documentary on the formation of the SAS by David Stirling and their daring raids behind enemy lines in North Africa.

title: David Stirling - The Phantom Major
description: In-depth look at David Stirling, the aristocratic founder of the SAS who became known as 'The Phantom Major' by the Germans.

title: The 88mm Gun - Rommel's Secret Weapon
description: Tank Museum curator explains the German 88mm Flak gun and how Rommel revolutionized its use as an anti-tank weapon in the desert.

title: The Afrika Korps - German Forces in North Africa
description: Overview of the Deutsches Afrikakorps, its formation, equipment, and the challenges of fighting in the North African desert.

title: The Desert Rats - British 7th Armoured Division
description: The story of the famous British 7th Armoured Division, who earned their 'Desert Rats' nickname fighting in North Africa.

title: Operation Torch - The Allied Invasion of North Africa
description: Animated overview of Operation Torch, the Allied landings in French North Africa that trapped Rommel between two armies.

title: Battle of Kasserine Pass - America's First Defeat
description: How inexperienced American forces were defeated by Rommel at Kasserine Pass, and the lessons learned from this battle.

title: Field Marshal Montgomery - El Alamein to Victory
description: Documentary on Bernard Montgomery's command of the Eighth Army and his methodical approach to defeating Rommel.

title: The Long Range Desert Group - Desert Warriors
description: The story of the LRDG, the reconnaissance unit that transported SAS teams and pioneered desert navigation.

title: Tanks in the Desert - North Africa 1940-43
description: Tank Museum experts examine the various tanks used by both sides in the desert war, from the Matilda to the Tiger.

title: Battle of Gazala - Rommel's Greatest Victory
description: Animated battle analysis of the Gazala campaign where Rommel outmaneuvered the British and captured Tobruk.

title: How Ultra Intelligence Defeated Rommel
description: How British codebreakers at Bletchley Park provided crucial intelligence that helped defeat Rommel in North Africa.
